column1: Uchi////This is probably my favorite restaurant in Houston.. not just because of the food (which deserves 5 stars alone)
column2: but also because of how helpful
column4: and informative the waiters are.  With an eclectic menu like theirs
column5: it can often be difficult to decide what dishes to get
column6: and some ingredients aren't common.  The waiters were so great about explaining everything
column7: recommending dishes based on your personal taste
